title: PoC – PLM in Dassault Systèmes
subTitle: Supported PLM system proof of concept with EO and BOM functionalities
overviewContent: Participated in a proof of concept (PoC) for a Product Lifecycle Management (PLM) system at Dassault Systèmes, supporting the development of key functionalities such as Engineering Orders (EO) and Bills of Materials (BOM). Assisted the team in validating system requirements and ensuring feasibility, contributing to a smoother implementation of PLM processes.

jd: Supported the development of Engineering Order (EO) pages by customising the Enovia solution.
Assisted in creating and maintaining Bills of Materials (BOM) and Engineering Orders (EOs).
Contributed to documenting testing scenarios, system documentation, ERDs, and end-user guides.
